K10bsu037_u:569: satkṛtya ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ pūjayitavyo dhārayitavyaḥ satkartavyaḥ parebhyaḥ saṃprakāśatitavyo
K10bsu037_u:572: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pūjayitvā vācayitavyaḥ dhvaje vā ucchrapitaṃ kṛtvā pūjayitvā
K10bsu037_u:574: caturdiśe baliṃ īttvābhinamaskṛtya puṣpadhūpagandhaiḥ sarva ityupadravāḥ praśamaṃ yāsyanti /
K10bsu037_u:576: atha bhagavān tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata /
K10bsu037_u:577: [sarvasya sattvasya anugrahārthaṃ] yā bhāṣitā pūrvabhaveṣu nāyakaiḥ /
K10bsu037_u:578: [ahaṃ tathā tvāmapi deśayiṣye] gṛṇhāhi ānanda imaṃ samādhim // Stav_1 //
K10bsu037_u:579: yaścaiva traidhātukadānu dadyā saptāna ratnāna ca pūrayitvā /
K10bsu037_u:581: buddheṣu dharmeṣu sadāpramattaḥ upamāpi tasya na sa bhonti dānam // Stav_2 //
K10bsu037_u:583: yaścaiva sūtraṃ[ca] dhareti kaści ayaṃ tato bahutaru puṇyu bheṣyate // Stav_3 //
K10bsu037_u:584: yaścāpi ekaṃ kṣipayeta puṣpaṃ vastraṃ ca mālyaṃ ca vilepanaṃ tathā /
K10bsu037_u:585: imaṃ samādhiṃ ca[ya] satkareta nāyaṃ tato bahutaru puṇyu bhoti // Stav_4 //
K10bsu037_u:587: yaścāpi kārṣāpaṇu dānu dadyā imasya sūtrasya ca pūjanārtham /
K10bsu037_u:588: janitvā bodhāya ca maitracitte ayaṃ tato bahutaru puṇyu prāpnuyā // Stav_5 //
K10bsu037_u:589: yaścāpi sattveṣu imaṃ samādhiṃ prakāśaye deśayi bodhisattvaḥ /
K10bsu037_u:590: pratipādaye bodhimanuttare tathā upamāpi puṇyaṃpi na tasya bhoti // Stav_6 //
K10bsu037_u:591: imaṃ ca śrutvā tatha ānuśaṃsāḥ kṛtvā ca maitraṃ tatha sarvasattvaiḥ /
K10bsu037_u:593: tasmāpi sūtram imu dhārayeta likheta vāceta tathā prakāśaye // Stav_7 //
K10bsu037_u:595: upapadyamānā narakeṣu pretayo mā paścakāle parītāpyu bheṣyatha // Stav_8 //
K10bsu037_u:597: kosmābhi trāṇaṃ bhavate parāyaṇaṃ mukhe mukhaṃ prekṣati bālabuddhiḥ // Stav_9 //
K10bsu037_u:599: [yasmā tathāgatamabhipūjayitvā] bauddhaṃ ca dharmaṃ tatha sāṃghikañca /
K10bsu037_u:600: hariṣya neṣye yamaloki dāruṇe na tasya trāṇaṃ sada kaści bheṣyati // Stav_10 //
K10bsu037_u:601: na putradāraṃ na ca mitrabāndhavān na cāpi rāṣṭraṃ na ca hāsyalāsyam /
K10bsu037_u:602: dhanaṃ na dhānyaṃ na ca vastrabhūṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ jahitvā puna duḥkhadāruṇam // Stav_11 //
K10bsu037_u:603: imaṃ samādhiṃ na ca śraddadhitvā tathā[ca duḥkhaṃ]dāruṇaṃ vedayate /
K10bsu037_u:605: ima duḥkhu śrutvā imu ānuśaṃsāḥ ko bālabuddhirna jane prasādam // Stav_12 //
K10bsu037_u:606: tasmācca tairhi sada bhikṣubhikṣuṇī upāsakopāsikarājabhiḥ sadā /
K10bsu037_u:607: imaṃ ca sūtraṃ sada dhārayitvā satkāru nityaṃ ca kartavyadhārake // Stav_13 //
K10bsu037_u:609: udgṛhītaṃ mayā bhagavan imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śāstṛsaṃjñayā dhārayiṣyāmi pūjayiṣyāmi sarvasattvebhyaḥ saṃprakāśayiṣyāmi /
K10bsu037_u:611: yadi tvamānanda yanmayā dharmo bhāṣitaḥ śruto dhārayituṃ tat sarvaṃ na dhāraye na
K10bsu037_u:612: vācaye na pūjaye na vaistārikīkuryā tvayā mama nāparādhye na cāśuśrūṣā kṛtā bhave na cāśrāvakatvam /
K10bsu037_u:614: na vācaye na pūjaye na saṃprakāśaye na manasikuryā sa mām aparādhye aśuśrūṣā kṛtā bhave aśrāvakatvaṃ bhave /
K10bsu037_u:615: tasmāttarhi tvamānanda satkṛtya ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo dhārayitavyaḥ /
K10bsu037_u:616: ayaṃ te tathāgatasyānuttarasamyaksaṃbodhatathāgatakṛtyaṃ kariṣyati paścime kāle paścime samaye sarvasattvānām /
K10bsu037_u:617: asmin khalu punardharmaparyāye bhagavatā bhāṣyamāṇe ṣaṣṭīnāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni saptānāṃ śatānāṃ bodhisattvasamādhipratilaṃbho 'bhūt /
K10bsu037_u:621: ayaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ paścimakāle paścimasamaye teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ śrotṝṇāṃ dhārayitṝṇāṃ mānayitṝṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca lekhakānāṃ tathāgatakṛtyaṃ kariṣyati /
K10bsu037_u:623: ye ca sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime[sama]ye hāsyanāṭyagītavāditeṣu nānāvyākṣepabahulā
K10bsu037_u:625: na pūjayiṣyanti na mānayiṣyanti na śraddhāsyanti na pattīyiṣyanti na dhārayiṣyanti
K10bsu037_u:627: te taṃ pūrvakarmaśubhaphalaṃ parikṣepaṃ kṛtvā nānāduḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ (Dutt 88)
K10bsu037_u:630: dīrgharātramakalyāṇamitravaśāḥ paścānutāpino bhaviṣyanti imaṃ kṣaṇaṃ virāgayitvā /
K10bsu037_u:632: buddhadharmasaṃghe[a]bhedyaprasādena sarvasattveṣu maitracittena īrṣyāmātsaryadauḥśīlyacittaparivarjitena krodhaparivarjitena bhavitavyam /
K10bsu037_u:633: atha sā yathāsamāgatā parṣa taistaiḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraiḥ tathāgataṃ pūjayati sma /
K10bsu037_u:635: tad yathā sādhu sādhu bhagavan subhāṣitamidaṃ mahādharmaparyāyaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya tathāgataśāsanacirasthityartham /
K10bsu037_u:637: kiṃnāmāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ kathaṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan dhārayāmaḥ /
K10bsu037_u:639: tasmāttarhi tvamānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sarvatathāgatajñānabodhisattvabhūmikramaṇamityapi nāma dhāraya /
K10bsu037_u:643: āttamānāḥ āryāvalokiteśvaramaṃjuśrīvajrapāṇiprabhṛtayaḥ sarve bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarve ca mahāśrāvakāḥ sarve ca śakrabrahmalokapālāścatvāraśca (Dutt 89)
K10bsu037_u:645: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣayathāsamāgatā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandya[sādhukāramadāt /
